tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_eta (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    current_location TEXT,
    destination_location TEXT,
    route_data JSON,
    estimated_time_of_arrival TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE vehicles ( vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY, current_location TEXT NOT NULL, route_id INT NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE routes ( route_id INT PRIMARY KEY, route_name TEXT NOT NULL, start_location TEXT NOT NULL, end_location TEXT NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE estimated_arrival_times ( arrival_id INT PRIMARY KEY, vehicle_id INT NOT NULL, route_id INT NOT NULL, estimated_time TIME NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE locations ( location_id INT PRIMARY KEY, location_name TEXT NOT NULL, latitude DECIMAL(9,6) NOT NULL, longitude DECIMAL(9,6) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE distance_matrix ( distance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, start_location_id INT NOT NULL, end_location_id INT NOT NULL, distance FLOAT NOT NULL );
